Text:
Hey Claudia ! 

Thank u soo much for posting the Y&R episodes! ;D I saw u also posted two episodes on a spanish website, and it's easier and faster for me to get the episodes from there. Would it be possible for u to keep posting them there too ??? It would really be fantastic ! If not, no pb! 
Have a great day! :]
Sorry I thought I was on a Y&R episode post here ^^
Well, Tediaa, I'm only posting here and on i-so-hunt, so I don't know the site you are talking about... is someone stealing identities??? LOL Anyway, thanks to you for being there!!
